name: transport, freight, light commercial vehicle, all, to generic market for transport, freight, light commercial vehicle | transport, freight, light commercial vehicle | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/20569/documentation

This is a linking activity which transfers part of the production volume of the specific transport, freight, light commercial vehicle unregulated, EURO1 and EURO2 to the generic market for transport, freight, light commercial vehicle.;The activity is meant to be used when the EURO class of the transport supplied is unkown. 

The activity strats with light commercial vehicles of different emissions classes.

The activity ends with the supply of the generic product, transport, freight, light commercial vehicle.
category: H:Transportation and storage/49:Land transport and transport via pipelines/492:Other land transport/4923:Freight transport by road

flow.name: transport, freight, light commercial vehicle
flow.category: H:Transportation and storage/49:Land transport and transport via pipelines/492:Other land transport/4923:Freight transport by road

exchanges.description:
Calculated from the production volumes.

The production volume is taken from the transport, freight, light commercial vehicle unregulated, EURO1 and EURO2 activities. 

It is estimated, that 50% of the production volume of this transport is transfered to the generic market for transport, freight,light commercial vehicle. Which means, that 50% of people using this transport do not know or do not care about the EURO class.
